abstract: The News Corporation and the Walt Disney Company are said to be close to deals for iTunes rentals at 99 cents a TV episode.
snippet: The News Corporation and the Walt Disney Company are said to be close to deals for iTunes rentals at 99 cents a TV episode.
lead_paragraph: Apple, which is widely expected to announce a revamped product for television sets next month, is pressing the television networks to rent their TV series through its iTunes service for as little as 99 cents an episode.

headline.main: Apple Said to Seek Show-Rental Deal
headline.print_headline: Apple Is Said to Seek Deal For 99-Cent Show Rentals

byline.original: By Brian Stelter and Miguel Helft

abstract: Senator Max Baucus, senior Democrat of Montana, said investor and philanthropist Warren Buffett is scheduled to participate in the Montana Economic Development Summit in Butte next month live via video
snippet: Senator Max Baucus, senior Democrat of Montana, said investor and philanthropist Warren Buffett is scheduled to participate in the Montana Economic Development Summit in Butte next month live via video
lead_paragraph: Senator Max Baucus, senior Democrat of Montana, said investor and philanthropist Warren Buffett is scheduled to participate in the Montana Economic Development Summit in Butte next month live via video, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Buffett and Diller to Speak at Big Sky Summit
